title: I've been listening to English songs for a while, but I don't know which one to go for. What is a list of really good songs that I should definitely listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: One direction! Every song is better than the other... A list of one direction songs would be:-Night changesYou and IStory of my lifeSpacesRock meTruly Madly DeeplySteal my girlWhat makes you beautifulOne way or anotherLive while we're youngThey don't know about usIrresistibleNo controlReady to runCloudsTakenBest song everJust can't let her goKiss youMagicLittle thingsOne thing18Etc.

"Which one to go for?"  Are you gonna buy the taste for you to listen songs??  'Good songs' are for you to decide. No one in this world, not even your parents, not even your God can provide you good music unless your love for specifc genre.
